errorDesc.favoriteIsEmpty: You can update popular places if you have one or several popular places on your list. Please add your popular place first.
errorDesc.placeIsAlreadyExist: The type of place you choose is already in your popular list.
errorDesc.general: It seems you can not get information properly. Please try again in a few moment.
